description.p: The fast and efficient invoice generator for craftsmen, self-employed and SMEs.

To create invoices more quickly, customers and articles can be conveniently saved for the future. Existing customer or article tables can be easily imported: Because both databases are saved in .csv format and can be edited with any spreadsheet editors like Libre Office Calc.

An invoice can be generated within a few seconds. Once all your own data has been filled in, Once all your data has been filled in, you can generate attractive invoices with automatic generation of the invoice number in no time at all.
New invoice generator (we now use chromium and html instead of latex). This is more adjustable and results in smaller download sizes.
